snippet: The girlfriend of James (Whitey) Bulger should spend 10 years in prison because she knowingly protected one of the region’s most violent mobsters, federal prosecutors said Friday.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say that Catherine Greig, the longtime girlfriend of James (Whitey) Bulger, should spend 10 years in prison because she knowingly protected one of New England's most violent mobsters for more than 16 years.
lead_paragraph: The girlfriend of James (Whitey) Bulger should spend 10 years in prison because she knowingly protected one of the region’s most violent mobsters, federal prosecutors said Friday.

headline.seo: Massachusetts: Long Term Sought for Whitey Bulger Friend
headline.main: Massachusetts: Long Term Sought for Bulger Friend
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Long Term Sought For Bulger Friend
